properties.Name: CalendarDate
properties.Description: The details for a specific date within a calendar.

Columns.Name: CalendarId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar.

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: The date of the associated calendar.

Columns.Name: DayOfWeekId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Day Of Week.

Columns.Name: CalendarDateStandardStartTime
Columns.Description: The standard time that operations start on this calendar date.

Columns.Name: CalendarDateStandardEndTime
Columns.Description: The standard time that operations end on this calendar date.

Columns.Name: HolidayIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the associated date is a holiday.

Columns.Name: HolidayName
Columns.Description: The name of the associated holiday.

Columns.Name: CalendarDayNumber
Columns.Description: The day number associated with the calendar date.

Columns.Name: CalendarWeekId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar Week.

Columns.Name: CalendarMonthId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a calendar month.

Columns.Name: CalendarQuarterId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a calendar quarter.

Columns.Name: CalendarYearId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar Year.

Columns.Name: CalendarPeriodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar Period.

Columns.Name: CalendarDateNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the calendar date.
